plot: Connie walks alone along the New York sidewalks, trying to come to terms with something we all have to face sooner or later: the final goodbye to certain memories.
title: Connie
plot_es: Connie walks alone along the New York sidewalks, trying to come to terms with something we all have to face sooner or later: the final goodbye to certain memories.
plot_en: Connie walks alone along the New York sidewalks, trying to come to terms with something we all have to face sooner or later: the final goodbye to certain memories.
